alert.note: Alert for Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 9:09PM CDT until April 23 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Prairie River near Taconite affecting Itasca County. Snake River near Pine City affecting Pine County. Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Morrison and Crow Wing Counties. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Crow Wing and Aitkin Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and remains forecast. * WHERE...Prairie River near Taconite. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, County Road 352 near Lawrence lake boat ramp becomes inundated. Flood waters cross County Road 319 near Crooked Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM CDT Friday was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday night. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.1 feet on 05/02/1970. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Prairie River Taconite 10.0 10.3 Fri 8 pm CDT 10.0 9.6 9.2 &&
info.instruction: Report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and to the National Weather Service in Duluth when you can do so safely. Flooding can be reported to the National Weather Service at 1-800-685-8612. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening by 1100 PM CDT.
